title: Eden Feint
description: The third in the Jim Dallas series, Eden Feint deals with a man convicted of murdering his wife - except his lawyer insists that he didn't do it. Jim and his friend Sam Lyons travel to an out-of-the-way Gulf community to search for exonerating clues, only to find themselves trapped by official harassment, a conspiracy of silence, and evidence of a long-ago crime. Summer Stowers had dreamed of creating a resort community she wanted to call Eden, never realizing that a deadly serpent in human form waited to end her dream once and for all.
author: Ken McKea
